Completely agree with you...It's an odd feeling to like Cousins and not like Furillo, yet sympathize with Furillo tonight

It doesn't matter if he tried to fight him or not, his behavior was out of line, even if his rage was justified - which I really disagree with - there is a right and wrong way to act...he acted like a child....I love Boogie, but cmon

I'm sorry, Boogie cannot be defended tonight..I don't like the old guard in the media either, and Furillo is kind of a dink, but come on can we not fanboy out for a second and look at this rationally...A reporter made a relevant aside in a column...he mentioned another incident relevant to his story....Cousins was beyond out of line
